sources.title: The Hanged Man
sources.description: Title: The Hanged Man Summary: Miraculously still alive after his hanging, gunfighter James Devlin defends a young widow's farm from a vicious land grabber. Directed by: Michael Caffey Actors: Steve Forrest, Dean Jagger, Will Geer Production Company: Andrew J. Fenady Productions Release Date: TV Movie 13 March 1974 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A gunfighter who survives his own hanging helps a young widow who is trying to keep a ruthless land baron from taking her ranch.
